case.name: Galatea Single
case.description: Lux asks Galatea if she's single - she's trying to play matchmaker with Galio (a giant gargoyle).

case.name: Lux Puns (F)
case.description: Must Strip (F) puns. The exact number of puns is tracked by the marker Light Pun. React with exasperation or other emotions.

case.name: Lux Puns (M)
case.description: Must Strip (M) puns. The exact number of puns is tracked by the marker Light Pun. React with exasperation or other emotions.

case.name: Lux Puns Criitcal Mass (M)
case.description: Lux's puns have reached a critical mass and she is running out of ideas. Even stoic characters might react to her terribly forced puns in these lines.

case.name: Lux Puns Critical Mass (F)
case.description: Lux's puns have reached a critical mass and she is running out of ideas. Even stoic characters might react to her terribly forced puns in these lines.

markers.marker: Counts how many times Lux has made a light pun.
Lux has said so many light puns she is running low on ideas and needs a moment to think.
Lux is getting ready to say Light puns.
Talking to Tharja about being a dark mage, in contrast to Lux being a light mage.
